title: Before You Die
description: The gripping new psychological suspense novel from the author of Until You’re Mine. Oh God, please don’t let me die.It has taken nearly two years for the Warwickshire village of Radcote to put a spate of teenage suicides behind it.Then a young man is killed in a freak motorbike accident, and a suicide note is found among his belongings. A second homeless boy takes his own life, this time on the railway tracks.Is history about to repeat itself?DI Lorraine Fisher has just arrived for a relaxing summer break with her sister. Soon she finds herself caught up in the resulting police enquiry. And when her nephew disappears she knows she must act quickly.Are the recent deaths suicide – or murder?And is the nightmare beginning again?
author: Samantha Hayes
